title: Swedish meatballs with cream sauce
ingredients: ['250g beef mince', '250g minced pork', '1/4 teaspoon nutmeg', '1/4 teaspoon allspice', '1 tablespoon flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '225ml milk (or water)', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '1 or 2 tablespoons vegetable oil for frying', 'For the creamy sauce', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons flour', '500ml stock (beef or vegetable)', '4 tablespoons cream', 'Few sprigs fresh dill to serve', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
